name: Jojo 3310
description:
Short Demo Game made for Nokia Jam. 

84x48 resolution, 2 colors and 1 tone at time. Theme was "Death is good!".

Jojo fan? give it a try! 

Press left ctrl to summon your  stand! once summoned, you control it instead to protect jojo even if it means death!

Dio is waiting at the end of level. *Menacing*

Jojo controls:

A and D:  move.

Left Ctrl : Summon Stand.

Stand controls:

A, D and W: move and jump.

Left Ctrl: Attack and Disappear.

S: Teleport player at stand position(Unlocks later in game)

Stand takes time to be ready again before being summoned.

Credits to:
Mj : Music(main theme)

Ara : Art and sprites!

Alex: SFX and music(End theme)

Arc. : Rest of it

Thank you so much to work with me! ^^
